docs.lead_paragraph: Medicare spending on breakthrough medications for hepatitis C will nearly double this year, passing $9 billion, according to new government figures. That's raising insurance costs for all beneficiaries, whether or not they have the liver-wasting viral disease.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: Medicare Spending $9B on Hepatitis C Drugs
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Medicare Spending $9B on Hepatitis C Drugs

docs.snippet: Medicare spending on breakthrough medications for hepatitis C will nearly double this year, passing $9 billion, according to new government figures. That's raising insurance costs for all beneficiaries, whether or not they have the liver-wasting...

docs.lead_paragraph: There’s no end to the promises of the presidential candidates.
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column finds presidential candidates' increasing capacity for promising voters everything they desire darkly comic.
docs.snippet: There’s no end to the promises of the presidential candidates.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ben Carson botched the economic effect of minimum wage increases. Jeb Bush again pitched a dubious target for economic growth. Marco Rubio, in a tale about plumbers and philosophers, undersold the value of a college education.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: In Republican Debate, Flubs and Funny Numbers
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: In Republican Debate, Flubs and Funny Numbers

docs.snippet: Ben Carson botched the economic effect of minimum wage increases. Jeb Bush again pitched a dubious target for economic growth. Marco Rubio, in a tale about plumbers and philosophers, undersold the value of a college education.
